The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 102.76 crore. The company management includes Ashok Kumar Oswal - Chairman & Managing Director, Adish Oswal - Executive Director, Ashok Kumar Goyal - Executive Director, Balbir Singh Bhatia - Independent Director, Ajay Chaudhry - Independent Director, Manohar Dattatraya Kanitkar - Independent Director, Rakhi Oswal - Director, Chandresh R Jain - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 514175 and the NSE with an NSE Code of VARDMNPOLY. Its Registered office is at "Vardhman Park, Chandigarh Road, Ludhiana,Punjab - 141123. Their Registrars are Alankit Assignment Ltd.}
